entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
